meanings.definition: A young woman making her debut into society.
meanings.sent1: The debutantes looked elegant in their beautiful gowns.
meanings.sent2: Many debutantes attend the ball to introduce themselves to society.
meanings.sent3: The debutantes giggled nervously as they practiced their curtsies.
meanings.sent4: The debutantes were like butterflies emerging from their cocoons.
meanings.sent5: The debutantes' entrance was the highlight of the evening.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of debutantes entering the grand hall.
meanings.sent2: The debutantes smiled and greeted the guests warmly.
meanings.sent3: The debutantes' dresses shimmered under the chandeliers.
meanings.sent4: The debutantes stood out in their elegant attire.
meanings.sent5: The debutantes' presence added charm to the event.
